title: Former Trump campaign official: Father forgive me, I believed his con
description: Former Trump campaign official Jessica Denson is now backing former Vice President Joe Biden for president, calling the Trump campaign a "vile, self-serving branding exercise" for Trump and his family.

title: Dr. Fauci: US may not be back to normal until 2022
description: As Covid-19 cases continue to jump during the fall surge, Dr. Anthony Fauci says there's little chance of normalcy on the horizon.

title: This is what voters in Pennsylvania are worried about
description: In Western Pennsylvania, where fracking for natural gas is a major economic driver, many worry about the future of fracking in the last week of the 2020 presidential election.

title: Biden says 'no excuse for looting' in wake of Wallace shooting
description: After casting his vote in the general election, Joe Biden was asked for his thoughts on the death of 27-year-old Walter Wallace Jr., who was shot and killed by Philadelphia Police.

title: CNN anchor calls out Trump's 'tone deaf' plea to suburban women
description: President Donald Trump offered his latest appeal to suburban women, promising to get their husbands "back to work" if he's reelected. CNN's Brianna Keilar calls out Trump's history of sexist and outdated comments.

title: See RuPaul and Cory Booker react to finding out they're cousins
description: Senator Cory Booker (D-NJ) and "Drag Race" star RuPaul Charles found out they're cousins after they each participated in PBS' "Finding Your Roots."

title: Why this historically red state might go blue in 2020
description: Arizona has voted for a Republican presidential candidate since 1952, with the exception of President Bill Clinton in 1996. Arizona voters explain why 2020 may be the year the state turns from red to blue.

title: What to watch for in House races across America
description: CNN's Phil Mattingly breaks down why Democrats are hopeful they will pick up more seats and increase their majority in the House of Representatives in the 2020 election.

title: These cats are on rat patrol
description: A cat shelter in Chicago is selling groups of feral cats for up to $600 to combat Chicago's rat problem, which is believed to be the worst in the country.

title: Los Angeles Dodgers' Justin Turner pulled mid-game during World Series win after positive Covid-19 test
description: The World Series hadn't seen anything quite like it in what was the most extraordinary of finales that posed as many questions as it did talking points.

title: CEOs of Facebook, Twitter and Google set to be grilled in Senate hearing
description: On Wednesday, the Senate Commerce Committee will question the CEOs of Facebook, Google and Twitter amid cries of conservative bias and threats to change a crucial law, known as Section 230, that protects the companies' ability to moderate content as they see fit.

title: Four dead, including two children, after boat sinks off French coast
description: Four people died, including two children, after a boat capsized in French waters while trying to reach the UK on Tuesday.

title: Police officer killed by rooster while breaking up cockfight
description: A police officer has been killed by a rooster while attempting to break up an illegal cockfight in the Philippines, officers have said.

title: US citizen detained in Belarus is released, Pompeo says
description: Vitali Shkliarov, an American who was detained in Belarus for three months, has been released and has returned to the US.

title: Police body cam maker unveils new features it hopes will curb officer misconduct
description: The nation's leading provider of police body cameras on Wednesday unveiled new features intended to help law enforcement supervisors better monitor officers and curb problematic behavior — changes the company says were motivated by the killing of George Floyd earlier this year.

title: Doctors and nurses face abuse as UK coronavirus cases soar but social distancing wanes
description: As a matron in a hectic ICU, Linda Gregson felt the coronavirus pandemic had stretched her idea of what was possible to its limits. Then came the video call.

title: Voters break down which candidate they're voting for
description: As Election Day nears, CNN's Alisyn Camerota speaks to a panel of voters about which candidate they plan on voting for and why.

title: Kim Kardashian West humbly threw a party on a private island during a pandemic, and the internet isn't letting it go
description: Undeterred by an ongoing pandemic, Kim Kardashian West has revealed she threw a party for herself and dozens of friends on a private island that swapped social distancing for dancing, bike-riding and swimming with whales. But at least she did it humbly.

title: Outgoing Barcelona president says club has agreed to join '$6 billion European Super League'
description: Outgoing Barcelona President Josep Maria Bartomeu says that the club has accepted invitations to join a much talked about new European Super League.

title: The covid concierge: Your secret travel weapon during the pandemic
description: Before Covid-19, São Paulo resident Claudia Glina regularly planned trips around Brazil and all over the world for her family, which includes herself, her husband and their two young children.

title: CNN's Avlon breaks down historic early voting turnout
description: CNN's John Avlon breaks down the historic turnout of early voters, six days ahead of Election Day.

title: A week away from Election Day, Trump greeted a mostly maskless crowd in the epicenter of America's quickening viral surge
description: President Donald Trump's final sprint to shore up states he won four years ago led him Tuesday into the epicenter of America's quickening viral surge in Wisconsin's record single day spikes in Covid-19 cases and deaths crystalized his administration's failures that could end his political career.

title: Obama to join Biden on campaign trail for final push
description: Former President Barack Obama is set to join Democratic nominee Joe Biden on the campaign trail during the final weekend of the election season, two people familiar with the plans told CNN.

title: New York Times: Tax records show Trump had over $270 million in debt forgiven after failing to repay lenders
description: President Donald Trump has had more than $270 million in debt forgiven since 2010 after he failed to repay his lenders for a Chicago skyscraper development, The New York Times reported Tuesday.

title: Markets can't ignore the pandemic any longer. Stocks are dropping
description: Stocks are selling off sharply on fears that Covid-19 infections are spiraling out of control again and government leaders could have no choice but to enact another wave of lockdowns.

title: London Heathrow loses its crown to Paris as passenger numbers plummet
description: London Heathrow has lost the title of Europe's busiest airport to Charles de Gaulle in Paris and is downgrading its forecasts for passenger numbers this year and next as the outlook for aviation deteriorates further.

title: What you need to know about coronavirus today
description: The United States reported half a million Covid-19 cases over the past week -- a record -- as cities and states scramble to stem a surge of the virus with new restrictions. America has the highest number of infections and the largest death toll worldwide.

title: Trailblazing climber told 'little girls don't belong'
description: Sasha DiGiulian is used to proving people wrong. She has done so throughout her life.

title: Philadelphia police ask residents to stay indoors as spurts of violence erupt during protests over the fatal police shooting of Walter Wallace Jr.
description: The Philadelphia Police Department requested that residents in seven districts stay indoors as demonstrators took to the streets for a second night following the fatal police shooting of Walter Wallace Jr.

title: Zeta strengthens into a hurricane as it barrels toward the US with life-threatening storm surge
description: Zeta strengthened back into a hurricane early Wednesday as it approaches the Gulf Coast, bringing life-threatening storm surge with it.

title: Mercedes-Benz is taking a big stake in Aston Martin
description: Mercedes-Benz is taking a big stake in struggling British carmaker Aston Martin.

title: Prince Harry says his upbringing left him unaware of unconscious racial bias -- 'I had no idea'
description: Prince Harry has admitted his upbringing made him unaware of unconscious racial basis, but that changed thanks to his relationship with Meghan, Duchess of Sussex.

title: Opposition in Zanzibar says candidate detained, people shot ahead of vote
description: An opposition presidential candidate in Zanzibar detained as he tried to vote early on Tuesday has been released, after nine people were shot dead by security forces ahead of Wednesday's elections, according to his party.

title: Bugatti unveils a super light hypercar that can top 300 miles an hour
description: Bugatti unveiled an 1,800-horsepower hypercar Wednesday that's even less practical than the powerful multimillion-dollar two-seaters the brand usually makes.

title: Why we should rethink the way we talk about politics to children
While Trump touts 'America First,' Biden is wary of 'America alone'
description: President Donald Trump and Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden are at almost opposite ends of major foreign policy issues. CNN's Alex Marquardt explains how they differ with their stances on North Korea, China, Russia and Israel.

title: Trump sells an alternative reality to win him reelection
Hong Kong teenage activist detained after reportedly planning to claim asylum at US consulate
description: A 19-year-old Hong Kong activist facing secession charges under the city's national security law was detained Tuesday amid reports he planned to attempt to claim asylum at the United States consulate.

title: Qatar 'regrets any distress' after women from 10 flights subjected to compulsory medical examinations at Doha airport
description: The government of Qatar has said it "regrets any distress or infringement on the personal freedom of any traveler" after it was revealed that at least 18 women from 10 different flights were subjected to compulsory intimate medical examinations following the discovery of an abandoned infant at Doha international airport.

title: Nearly 70,000 people under mandatory evacuation orders as two new wildfires in Southern California spread rapidly
description: Mandatory evacuations have been ordered for approximately 70,000 residents in Orange County, California, as firefighters continue to battle two new wildfires -- the Silverado Fire and Blue Ridge Fire -- which grew to nearly 30,000 acres combined in less than 48 hours.

title: Typhoon Molave makes landfall in Vietnam in the aftermath of deadly floods
description: Typhoon Molave made landfall just south of the Vietnamese resort city Da Nang on Wednesday, lashing the coast with powerful rains and winds, and inflicting further misery on an area still reeling from widespread deadly flooding.

title: Antarctic fossil could have been the biggest flying bird ever, study finds
description: In the 1980s, paleontologists at the University of California Riverside visited Seymour Island, part of an island chain in the Antarctic Peninsula. They brought home a number of fossils -- including the foot bone and partial jaw bone of two prehistoric birds.

title: Vanessa Guillen's sister says 'we still don't know the truth' about her death
description: Months after the remains of Army Spc. Vanessa Guillen were found in Texas, her family says there are still many things they don't know about her killing.

title: Drama at the zoo: Egg-napping male penguin couple steals the nest of a female penguin couple
description: Is this the plot of a soap opera involving penguins? No, it's just another day at DierenPark Amersfoort, a zoo in the Netherlands.

title: This floating spaceport in Japan could bring space travel to the city
description: Cylindrical steel and glass towers protrude through solar panels on the vast circular roof of the futuristic, four-story Spaceport City.

title: Anderson Cooper: We are witnessing dishonesty the likes of which no one has seen before
description: CNN's Anderson Cooper goes over the presidential candidates' campaign stops a week out from the end of election season.

title: Obama fires back after Trump's Covid-19 complaint
description: Former President Barack Obama reemerged on the campaign trail in Orlando to push votes for Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden. Obama took aim at President Donald Trump's response to the coronavirus pandemic. CNN's Erin Burnett reports.
